type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyPluginConvention
type.description: Convention properties and methods added by the org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyPlugin. @deprecated The Jetty plugin has been deprecated

method.name: getHttpPort
method.description: Returns the TCP port for Jetty to listen on for incoming HTTP requests.

method.name: getStopKey
method.description: Returns the key to use to stop Jetty.

method.name: getStopPort
method.description: Returns the TCP port for Jetty to listen on for stop requests.

property.name: httpPort
property.description: Returns the TCP port for Jetty to listen on for incoming HTTP requests.

property.name: stopKey
property.description: Returns the key to use to stop Jetty.

property.name: stopPort
property.description: Returns the TCP port for Jetty to listen on for stop requests.
